extendedInfo.description: "Where on Earth" is a fun geography game to play on your phone.  Its seven individual games in one!  Learn the locations of the countries on each continent.  And learn the location of the fifty U.S. states too!  Once you know the country locations, from this game or a geography class, play this game over and over to reinforce your knowledge of world geography. The "Where on Earth" games include all 50 states and 168 countries found on 6 different continents.

reviews.comment: Great game! Lots of fun to play. I like that the game remembers the high scores for each continent.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The pictures below show it zoomed in but I have found no way to zoom in and the states r too small to tap. Double tap doesn\'t work either for zoom.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great game. The lite version with US states is easy. The other maps will keep me challenged for a long time. I really like the hints.
reviews.author: A Google User
